PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05862017-06-02,  ,  ,  NRCAN,  NEB, 
ActNational Energy Board Act
National Energy Board Act Part VI (Oil and Gas) Regulations
SubjectIssuance of Licence GL-340 - Woodfibre LNG Export Pte. Ltd.
PrecisOrder approving the ISSUANCE OF LICENCE GL-340 by the National Energy Board to WOODFIBRE LNG EXPORT PTE. LTD. in order to export natural gas from Canada for a period of 40 years, and that the point of export be at the outlet of the loading arm of the liquefaction facility to be located near Squamish, British Columbia.
AttachmentsAttachment
